# Automatically disable some functions when running under GNOME
# AutoDetectGNOME=3D1 # 0 / 1

# Delay before task bar is automatically hidden

# AutoRaise=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Delay before windows are auto raised
# AutoRaiseDelay=3D400 # 0-5000

ft top/middle/bottom, ...)

t top/middle/bottom, ...)
MoveSizeDimensionLines=3D1 # 0-4095

MoveSizeGaugeLines=3D1 # 0-15

# Bitmask for geometry labels (1/2/4: top left/center/right, 8: center, .=
..)
MoveSizeGeometryLabels=3D8 # 0-127

# Bitmask for inner decorations (1: border style, 2: titlebar, 4/8/16: gr=
id)

# Show icons of windows on the task bar
# TaskBarShowWindowIcons=3D1 # 0 / 1

# Show "window list" menu on task bar
# TaskBarShowWindowListMenu=3D1 # 0 / 1

# Show windows on the taskbar
# TaskBarShowWindows=3D1 # 0 / 1

# Show workspace switching buttons on task bar
# TaskBarShowWorkspaces=3D1 # 0 / 1

# Terminal emulator (must accept -e option)
# TerminalCommand=3D"xterm"

# Theme (theme_directory/default.theme)
Theme=3D"E15/default.theme"

# Theme author
# ThemeAuthor=3D""

# Theme description
# ThemeDescription=3D""

# Clock time format (strftime format string)
# TimeFormat=3D"%X"
TimeFormat=3D"%T"

# Alternate Clock Time format (e.g. for blinking effects)
# TimeFormatAlt=3D""

# Title bar height
# TitleBarHeight=3D20 # 0-128

# Horizontal offset for the window title
# TitleBarHorzOffset=3D0 # -128-128

# Join title*S and title*T
# TitleBarJoinLeft=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Join title*T and title*B
# TitleBarJoinRight=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Justification of the window title
# TitleBarJustify=3D0 # 0-100

# Mouse-button clicked on titlebar to maximize window
# TitleBarMaximizeButton=3D1

# Mouse-button clicked on titlebar to roll up window
# TitleBarRollupButton=3D2

# Vertical offset for the window title text
# TitleBarVertOffset=3D0 # -128-128

# Titlebar buttons from left to right (x=3Dclose, m=3Dmax, i=3Dmin, h=3Dh=
ide, r=3Drollup, s=3Dsysmenu)
# TitleButtonsLeft=3D"s"

# Titlebar buttons from right to left (x=3Dclose, m=3Dmax, i=3Dmin, h=3Dh=
ide, r=3Drollup, s=3Dsysmenu)
# TitleButtonsRight=3D"xmir"

# Titlebar buttons supported by theme (x, m, i, r, h, s, d)
# TitleButtonsSupported=3D"xmis"

# Title bar font
# TitleFontName=3D"-adobe-helvetica-bold-r-*-*-*-120-*-*-*-*-*-*"

# Delay before tooltip window is displayed
# ToolTipDelay=3D1000 # 0-5000

# Tooltip font
# ToolTipFontName=3D"-adobe-helvetica-medium-r-*-*-*-120-*-*-*-*-*-*"

# Time before tooltip is hidden
# ToolTipTime=3D0 # 0-5000

# Surround the tray with plastic border
# TrayDrawBevel=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Show windows from all workspaces on tray
# TrayShowAllWindows=3D1 # 0 / 1

# Support mouse wheel
# UseMouseWheel=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Bitmask of root window button click to use in window manager
# UseRootButtons=3D7

# Workspace switches by moving mouse to top/bottom screen edge
# VerticalEdgeSwitch=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Move mouse when doing focusing in pointer focus mode
# WarpPointer=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Support win95 keyboard keys
# Win95Keys=3D0 # 0 / 1

# Names of the Workspaces
WorkspaceNames=3D" 1 "," 2 "," 3 "," 4 "

# Time before workspace status window is hidden
# WorkspaceStatusTime=3D2500 # 0-2500

# Overrides automatic Xrender detection
# XFreeType=3D1 # 0 / 1

# MoveSize font
moveSizeFontName=3D"-adobe-helvetica-bold-r-*-*-*-100-*-*-*-*-*-*"
